meanings.def: the activity of applying scientific knowledge to the design, building and control of machines, roads, bridges, electrical equipment, etc.
examples: The bridge is a triumph of modern engineering.
Train services on Sunday will be restricted because of engineering works.
The bridge is a fine piece of engineering.
The building is a remarkable feat of engineering.

meanings.def: the study of engineering as a subject

related: science, technology, engineering, arts and mathematics
